room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Fun, challenging and awesome! I didn't know what to expect but it was so much fun! Something different to do with friends or family that requires team work and problem solving. All while racing the clock

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Fun, challenging and awesome! I didn't know what to expect but it was so much fun! Something different to do with friends or family that requires team work and problem solving. All while racing the clock

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Great game with great employees and atmosphere. Love the games they're always fun and challenging. Our group has done island escape and casino Royale. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: It wasn't bad. $25 is a bit steep if you choose to look at it as though it were a run of the mill "thing to do." Only thing I wish were that parking were better and if things were started a little more on time. Still, not bad.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: We almost made it out of island escape but it took us too long to figure out the first clue. Would've been better with more people, we only had two, but I will definitely be back to do the other rooms and hope they add some new ones!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Our "Mom's Day Out" was spent barely making it off the island before the volcano erupted. We seriously had 1:17 left and we were getting anxious. Had a blast working together and were SO thankful for our clue's. We wouldn't have known where to begin if it weren't for our first clue, especially since it was our first time there. I can't wait to plan my next visit!! So glad to have something new, fun, and exciting to do in town!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: We made it out just in time!!!! This was so much fun! There were 6 in our group and we did the island escape. The puzzles were more difficult than I thought they would be but that is what made it a real challenge and fun! If the clues had been too easy it could have been boring...but they aren't, they are prefect!!! Taylor was our host and he was an awesome! Tip your hosts. They greatly appreciate it and are worth it...they are ensuring your group has a good time after all. Highly recommend for family, friends, or work!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: We did the Island Escape as a family and it was a great time! We were definitely challenged and had only 20 seconds to spare when we made it out. As a family we have a very competitive side but during the challenge we realized it was more about escaping then setting a record. We enjoyed it so much that we have already started talking about our next challenge even though we are rarely all in town. Thanks for the opportunity to be together and enjoy laughter and the thrill of victory! Our Game Master was awesome as well! I hope we kept him sufficiently entertained.
